Join your Provincial PowerSports Federations at the PowerSports Adventure Show in Abbortsford - working hard to make sure you have places to sled, ride and tour.

From the PowerSports Show staff and Nanette:

We’d like to invite all dirt bikers, sledders, and quaders, along with all other powersports enthusiasts to come down to the new Powersports Adventure Show, which is produced by the same team that has produced the Vancouver Motorcycle Show – the biggest industry motorcycle show in Canada - for the past decade.

We’d also like to extend a special ticket price to your members – 2 admissions for the price of one - as a special courtesy to BCORMA, ATVBC, and BCSF members for all the support we have received from your Provincial Federations.

We’ll have lots of products and services for everyone to see, as well as special features and seminars. We are working with the manufacturers to offer special show pricing as well. The show also features snowmobiles, ATVs and personal watercraft so, if you like lots of toys, there is plenty to see and buy at the show.

BCORMA, ATVBC, and BCSF will be on the main floor as you walk in. Look for the big booth with the trail kiosk.

Answering your questions:

  • How the coming Natural Resource Road Act affects you
  • New "Safety" regulations under OHV Framework
  • BCORMA & ATVBC's coming Charter with the Province
  • What about club events on Crown land?
  • BCORMA Ride Schools for 2013
  • Where to Ride
  • Give us your concerns and ideas 

All Federations' members and community can purchase a 2 for 1 ticket special on-line through September 30th.  Just fill in your promo code: RIDER
Remember, this offer is only good through September 30th, and you have to buy your tickets in blocks of twos.

Peter
